ComicInfo.Summary: Resurgence [Part 2]: Investigating the disappearance of Dr. Leah Brahms, Solano and Sutherland are captured by the Talarians, which leads to Bedrosian and Westbrook staging a rescue mission to rescue them and Dr. Brahms.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 08:47:42. [CVDB960089] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:07:48. [Issue ID 2465936]
